_header: Illa iuventus that is so nice / Me deduxit in to vain devise
_description: A macaronic carol of five quatrains and refrain: ‘Terribilis mors conturbat me’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Illa juventisthat is so wild nyseMe
                        deduxitin to vayn devise…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…In celum ther is joy with theTerribilis mors
                        conturbat meExplicit
